text: Park Ji-yoon (born March 23, 1979) is a South Korean former announcer and host. She is currently a host of the variety show Gourmet Road and has been a cast member of JTBC's Crime Scene since 2014. Park Ji-yoon has been married to her former fellow KBS presenter Choi Dong-suk since 11 September 2009. ==Filmography== ===TV series=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
